meanings.definition: Thoroughbreds: a breed of horse known for its speed and agility
meanings.sent1: The ranch had a stable full of thoroughbreds.
meanings.sent2: The jockeys were excited to race the thoroughbreds at the track.
meanings.sent3: The thoroughbreds decided to have a race of their own in the pasture.
meanings.sent4: Watching the thoroughbreds run was like witnessing poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The thundering hooves of the thoroughbreds echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: Thoroughbreds: individuals or things that are of superior quality or excellence
meanings.sent1: The team of scientists were thoroughbreds in their field.
meanings.sent2: The company only hired thoroughbreds to ensure top-notch performance.
meanings.sent3: The thoroughbreds of the culinary world battled it out in a cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was considered a thoroughbred among the local artists.
meanings.sent5: The thoroughbreds of the music industry always produced chart-topping hits.
